findings.rationale: Perpetual obligations may hinder future business opportunities and create uncertainty for both parties, as they can be bound indefinitely.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: Unlimited indemnification can expose a party to significant financial risk in the event of a breach, as there is no cap on potential liabilities.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: Lack of limitation on liability can lead to unpredictable financial exposure for both parties, especially in cases of negligence or breach.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Exclusive ownership of work product by one party may lead to disputes regarding rights to use or modify the deliverables created.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.

findings.rationale: The provision for recovery of attorneys' fees may discourage parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to fear of incurring additional costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
